name: Immortal
description: The Alpha 1.0 of my new game, Immortal, is now available for window ! Please try it and give me some feedback/ideas/bugs to help me improve it. Feel free to share and download it at adrenos.sytes.net/immortal There is currently just one level with no end, but many features will come in the future like full campaign with story, customisable ships and weapons and a 1v1 multiplayer mode ! Thanks !
